QuestData.Title: He Drew Aggro...culture
QuestData.Description: What you saw was the wake of the genesaur, Iyu. It was chasing this mechanical monstrosity and the person who drove it.$b$bI believe the pilot of this vessel is still alive and trapped within the ruins of the camp.$b$bIf you wish them to be recovered, I recommend doing so now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the pilot of the Dark Iron tank.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah perfect. I'll get this up an' runnin' in no time.

Objectives.Objective: Find the pilot of the Dark Iron Tank
